timeline.content:
Hey Zhenhuan, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London!
I am Mahmudul and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home.

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

timeline.content: Hello Zhenhuan, i can see you tried making the deposit payment of Saver En Suite for iQ Highbury, London, I regret to there is a lot of booking request for the same and we got only one room available now, please confirm your if you are still planing to book the saver ensuite so I can help you with it.
